text: An organ procurement organization may screen, test, or recover eyes or tissues on behalf of an eye bank or tissue bank.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Authority of organ procurement organization acting on behalf of eye bank or tissue bank.
